p: In addition, our current understanding of the critical safety factors of patchouli is somewhat inadequate; additional preclinical studies that feature both acute and long-term toxicities associated with patchouli should be carried out in the near future. Pharmacological studies of patchouli and its derivative compounds have been performed primarily in vitro and in vivo using small animal models. As such, clinical studies in humans are urgently needed to confirm these pharmacological findings and to promote the development of TCM preparations for extended use worldwide.
